item.title: Ilya Lichtenstein, Bitcoin hacker behind massive crypto theft, credits Trump for early prison release

item.title: Trump says U.S. will intervene if Iran 'violently kills' protestors
item.description: Protests erupted last week over the government's handling of a sharp fall in the nation's currency and soaring prices.

item.title: New York Mayor Mamdani vows to enact democratic socialist agenda
item.description: Zohran Mamdani was sworn in as New York City mayor in the first minutes of the New Year at the historic City Hall subway station.

item.title: Italy says U.S. sharply reduced proposed pasta tariffs after a review
